nodes.text: Sélima Kim was a female individual who operated as a pirate during an unknown era.
Kim was a mediocre pirate who, once in old age, specialized in repairs, maintenance and sales of privateer's ships. Her son later took over the business, which he christened after his mother.
Sélima Kim was created by Pierre Zaplotny for the ambiguously-canon roleplaying article Sélima Kim: une base pirate which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 60.
